subject: Rose Bowl (Football Game)
College Athletics
Football
Child Abuse and Neglect
Football (College)
lead_paragraph: Kevin Ash, the chief administrative officer of the Rose Bowl, said Thursday that if Penn State were to win the Big Ten title, the Nittany Lions would be free to play in the game.
snippet: Kevin Ash, the chief administrative officer of the Rose Bowl, said Thursday that if Penn State were to win the Big Ten title, the Nittany Lions would be free to play in the game.
